title: The Haunted Abbey
description: Gilbert and Jade seek shelter in an ancient ruined abbey after a nice pleasant bike ride takes an incredible turn. The freak storm that comes from nowhere is the least of their worries as the wailing green ghost emergesâ€¦ Gilbert thinks he's tougher than Jade and knows that ghosts don't exist. But who do you think is the scaredy cat when the hooded figure stands before them?They soon find out that the ghostly monk who wanders around the old stone building is not as terrifying as he first appears, and gives them a wonderful gift. Gilbert loves gold and shiny things but learns that bravery and kindness have a much higher value.
author: Richard J. Ward
